name: Pastry Assault
description:
REMEMBER: Doughnuts have holes so dont shoot straight at the evil, jam filled bisquits. They will fly right through the doughnut, unharmed.

Controlls:
W/A/S/D --- Moving
SPACE ------- Shoot

This game was developed as Part of the Mini jam 56. The Theme was Sky and you had to include 2 random themes (in this case Doughnut and war zone). So i created a Game where you fight against pastry with doughnuts as projectiles. 

This was my first game jam and even though I`m very sleep deprived It was a whole lot of fun and learning. I cant wait to see all the other great games you guys made.

The next time i participate in a game jam(which will definitly happen), I will be a lot more prepeared.

But now i have to get some rest.

Programms used:

Bosca Ceoil

BFXR

Aseprite

Gimp
